title: [Pig Puddle Lane, Dirt Road]
description: By the side of the road is an old, half-rotten oxcart.  The bench is now splinters, the wheels are all gone, and it's propped up on uneven crates.  A spotted hound sleeps fitfully in the darkness underneath, occasionally waking to shake off the gnats.

By the side of the road is an old, half-rotten oxcart.  The bench is now splinters, the wheels are all gone, and it's propped up on uneven crates.  A spotted hound sleeps fitfully in the shade underneath, occasionally waking to shake off the flies.
